add_gt_rowname_separator

Source: R/to_gt.R
add_gt_rowname_separator.Rd

Adds a vertical line between the row names part and the data of the table.

Usage

add_gt_rowname_separator(gt_tbl, right_of, separator_style)

Arguments

gt_tbl

great table

right_of

name of the last data column to the right of which the actual data starts

separator_style

style of the vertical line that separates the row names from the data.

On this page
